title: Bug 102516JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand
description: Bug 102516JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand The JDBC Data Set Editor page for a SQL Query has a tree control that lists thetables and columns in your data source.
OB: When the data set editor is opened, you have to wait while the entire schema is queried and eventually get the message 'Only 500 items can be viewed in the available list...'
EB: The JDBC Data Set Editor should load the tables and columns on demand, without the need to query the entire schema. Additionally, it should not display a limitation message for viewing items in the available list.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the JDBC Data Set Editor.
2. Observe the system query the entire schema and display the message 'Only 500 items can be viewed in the available list...'
